name: Driver Wise
query:
SELECT
    o.assigned_volunteer,
    v.full_name AS volunteer_name,
    COUNT(*) AS volunteer_order_count,
    SUM(o.no_of_biriyani) AS total_biriyani
FROM
    `tabOrders` o
LEFT JOIN
    `tabVolunteer` v ON o.assigned_volunteer = v.name
GROUP BY
    o.assigned_volunteer, v.full_name;
